name: Unfinished Hell Hole
description:
Game developed for GDTV2022 JAM with too little time and too weird of a concept for the few available past weekend. You can skip this one as there is a bare minimum gameplay :)

Concept for the theme "DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING!" is to:

  • Die from an enemy and take control of their body. Gaining their strengths/abilities or ability to open matching dungeon entrances. 
  • If an enemy of the same "TRAIT" (Ability) attacks you will die, if you consume a trait before you die, your health is restored and you take over that body.

Github:

https://github.com/SHEePYTaGGeRNeP/GameDevTVGameJam

Tooling used:

  • https://pixilart.com
  • Blender 3
  • TexturePacker (Free)
  • Unity 2022
    • Assets; URP and (maybe) Utils
